mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS boardNo, B.BOARD_TITLE AS boardTitle, B.CONTENTS AS contents, F.FILE_PATH || '/' || F.FILE_REALNAME AS thumb FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN BOARD_FILE F ON B.BOARD_NO = F.BOARD_NO AND F.THUMBNAIL = 'Y' WHERE B.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY B.CDATE DESC

SELECT C.CHAT_NO AS chatNo, L.LAWYER_NAME AS lawyerName, M.MESSAGE AS message, TO_CHAR(M.TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS chatTime FROM CHAT C JOIN CHAT_MESSAGE M ON C.CHAT_NO = M.CHAT_NO JOIN LAWYER L ON C.RECEIVER_ID = L.LAWYER_ID WHERE C.SENDER_ID = #{userId} AND M.TIME = ( SELECT MAX(TIME) FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE CHAT_NO = C.CHAT_NO ) ORDER BY M.TIME DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_USER SET USER_STATUS = 'OUT', CDATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE LAWYER SET LAWYER_STATUS = 'O' WHERE LAWYER_ID = #{sessionId}
